hints.content:
We start at $4{:}17$ when Rani finishes painting. 

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 3:30 to 4:30 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 4:17. !

hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents $1$ minute.

So, we need to move **left** on the number line $42$ minutes.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{4{:}17} -{} &\greenD{2}\text{ minutes} = 4{:}15\\\\
4{:}15 -{} & \purpleD{15}\text{ minutes} = 4{:}00 \\\\
4{:}00 -{}&\goldE{25}\text{ minutes} = \goldE{3{:}35}\\\\
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 3:30 to 4:30  with tick marks every 1 unit. A series of three arrows are shown moving right to left from the 4:17 tick mark to the 3:35 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 4:17 tick mark and ends at the 4:15 tick mark and is labeled minus 2. The second arrow starts at the 4:15 tick mark and ends at the 4:00 tick mark and is labeled minus 15. The third arrow starts at the 4:00  tick mark and ends at the 3:35 tick mark and is labeled minus 25. !

hints.content:
Rani starts painting at $3{:}35\text{ p.m.}$ 

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 3:30 to 4:30 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 3:35. !

question.content:
Rani finishes painting her room at $4{:}17\text{ p.m.}$ She painted for $42$ minutes.

**Which number line below graphs when Rani starts painting?**

[[☃ radio 1]]
